sourcesContent:
// this page will explain what SaleSight offers to users. // no need to be authenticated (unprotected route) // renders LogInNavBar // and About components // welcome to SaleSight // p tag or main to explain what SaleSight offers to users. // 3 DIVS ALIGNED horizontally : Key Points; sale Insight, Profit Optimization and Real Time Revenue Management // box shadow, box inside of div and image . import React from "react"; import LogInNavBar from "../components/LogInNavBar"; function About() { return ( <>

Welcome to SaleSight - Your Revenue and Profit Management Tool

Key Features

  • Sale Insight: Streamlines profit calculation for each product and visualizes cost and revenue with pies and charts.
  • Profit Optimization: Designed to calculate and track revenues, sales, costs, and profits for products sold by users.
  • Real-Time Revenue Management: Users can continuously track and monitor changes in revenue, sales, and costs, providing immediate insights into their business health.

Product Overview

SaleSight helps online sellers by providing a comprehensive product unit sales price and cost analysis. Each user can manage multiple products, track costs, and monitor the sales and profit margins generated by each product.

Key functionalities include:

  • Product Management: Users can add and manage multiple products.
  • Cost Tracking: Each product can have associated cost entries, which may change over time.
  • Sales Monitoring: Users can view and track sales history for each product.
  • Profit Calculation: For each product, the profit margin is calculated based on sales revenue minus costs.
  • Analytics: Users can view an overview of total revenues, costs, and profits across all products.

Benefits

  • Financial Overview: Users get a clear view of their product-related finances, including costs, revenues, and profits.
  • Improved Decision-Making: Tracking costs and profit margins enables informed decisions on pricing, inventory, and product investment.
  • Sales Insights: Detailed sales tracking helps users understand trends and performance for strategic planning.
  • Profit Optimization: Monitoring profit margins per product identifies high-performing products and informs strategy adjustments for lower performers.
  • User-Friendly Interface: An intuitive platform makes it easy for users to manage multiple products and maintain financial oversight.

User Stories

  • Profit calculator for individual sellers, online sellers, or e-commerce sellers.
  • As a user, I should be able to see the cost for each product.
  • As a user, I should have profit margin for each product.
  • As a user, I should be able to see the total revenue and profit margin (with given selling price subject to change).

Solution

The app provides a step-by-step plan for calculating profits based on the following inputs:

  • Revenue (Selling Price): How much the product is sold for.
  • Cost of Goods Sold (COGS): All costs related to producing or purchasing the product.
  • Other Costs: Shipping, marketing, or any additional expenses affecting profitability.

The outputs include profit-related calculations such as:

  • Gross Profit
  • Profit Margin
  • Net Profit

Formula: Profit = Revenue - (COGS + Other Costs)

Users can see calculated profits, total sales, and product counts, providing a complete financial overview.

); } export default About;
